itunes:title: Lent 2020 Week 7 with Andrew Peterson
title: Lent 2020 Week 7 with Andrew Peterson
description:
As we step into Holy Week, Raechel and Amanda are joined by singer-songwriter, author, and keeper of bees Andrew Peterson. The three share stories from a life-changing trip to Israel they took together a few years ago. They talk about worship at the Western Wall, the view from the Mount of Olives, and the eye-opening experience of walking where Jesus walked. He is risen! The stories are true!

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 7 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-7-with-andrew-peterson/
